charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_1101_0100:
Greta asked [Name:PlayerNickname ] to be her
training opponent one day, and [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] accepted.
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_1101_0200:
She may have called it training, but Greta was
battling seriously, so [Name:PlayerNickname ]
didn’t hold anything back, either.
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_1201_0300: Arrrgh! No way! This is so infuriating!
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_1201_0400:
I was THIS close to defeating you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_0401_0600:
Graaah! You say that like it doesn’t even matter
to you!
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_0302_0700: Wasn’t this supposed to be training?
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_0402_0800: Training or not, a battle’s a battle!
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_0402_0900:
It doesn’t matter how serious it is—if I can’t win,
I get FRUSTRATED!
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_1201_1000:
But...that did turn out to be pretty good training,
so I guess it’s fine!
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_1201_1200:
I’m glad I got a chance to try out a bunch of
Breloom’s moves!
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_1201_1300: Breloom has the power of a fighting Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_1201_1400:
but she can also battle strategically like grass
Pokémon do, so she’s really a favorite of mine!
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_0401_1600:
Hey, what’s with that? Did you think I’m the type
of person who relies on brute force?
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_0302_1700: So it’s not just power you care about.
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_0402_1800:
Of course not! Power isn’t the only thing that can
tip the scales of battle, you know!
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_1201_1900:
If you confine yourself to just one style of fighting,
your opponent can easily interrupt your flow!
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_1201_2000:
You’ve gotta have a variety of options so that you
can be flexible and react to every situation!
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_1201_2100:
Actually, it’s probably the Battle Frontier’s
influence that helped me learn to think that way.
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_1201_2200:
See, at the Battle Arena where I’m the Arena
Tycoon...
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_1201_2300:
If the battlers can’t defeat each other’s
Pokémon, they’re judged based on three criteria:
mind, skill, and body.
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_1201_2400:
Mind! How proactively did they choose attack
moves?
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_1201_2500:
Skill! How accurately did they use their moves
against their opponent?
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_1201_2600: Body! Who was the healthiest at judgment time?
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_1201_2700:
The answers to those three questions combined
determine the winner!
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_1201_2800:
So that’s why I’m always consciously trying to
improve my mind, skill, and body whenever I’m
training or battling!
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_1201_2900:
You look like you have a lot of potential in those,
too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_1201_3000:
I think you can improve even further, so if you
keep training those qualities, you’ll be headed in
the right direction!
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_1201_3100:
I’m looking forward to battling you again when
you’ve gotten even tougher,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0199_00_kogomi/2301_1201_3200: And next time, I won’t lose! Don’t you forget it!
